sections.title: Chapter Structure
sections.description: Our chapter is structured with a Steering Committee, elected officers, standing committees, and working groups. General membership meetings are held monthly.

sections.title: Decision Making
sections.description: Major decisions are made democratically through membership votes. Our chapter strives for consensus while recognizing the need for timely action.

sections.title: Elections & Terms
sections.description: Officers serve for two-year terms. Elections are held annually with staggered terms to ensure continuity of leadership and institutional knowledge.

sections.title: Amendments
sections.description: Bylaws can be amended through a two-thirds vote of members present at a general meeting, with amendments proposed at least two weeks in advance.
